events.title: Donated
events.description: A very generous donation in honor of his dog's birthday.

events.title: Visited Mochi HQ
events.description: Gideon came to meet us in our headquarters. We took him around for a tour and he was impressed with our operation!

events.title: Donated
events.description: Gideon would like his gift to fund the purchase new instruments for the groups at Beth Am.

events.title: Annual Appeal Sent
events.description: Emailed our annual appeal requesting funds for our new-age art initiative.

events.title: Lunch with Board Members
events.description: Gideon joined our board members for lunch at John's diner to discuss how he can get more involved in the organization.

events.title: Donated
events.description: Gideon provided funding to help purchase new music for the various musical groups at Beth Am.

events.title: Donated
events.description: Gideon provided funding to help purchase new art supplies for starving artists.

events.title: Donated
events.description: Gideon provided funding to help provide shelter for homeless people.
